definition: Xibo ethnic group of northeast China
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
Xibo ethnic group of northeast China
Qapqal Xibe autonomous county in Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
pinyin: Cha2 bu4 cha2 er3 Xi1 bo2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: Being a descent of Xibo People, archery is my passion.
sentences.chinese: 作为锡伯族的后裔，射箭是我的热爱。

sentences.english: Tom Thibodaux now only need to wait for a win Best Coach of the Year.
sentences.chinese: 现在只需要等待锡伯杜赢得年度最佳教练了。

sentences.english: Now I can compete with our Xibe friends.
sentences.chinese: 可以好好跟锡伯族的朋友们比一比。

sentences.english: Home-heritage site for the Xibo People. It is in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国辽宁沈阳市的锡伯族家庙。

sentences.english: The cultural choice of the Xibo nationality is a historical process.
sentences.chinese: 锡伯族的文化选择是个历史的过程。

sentences.english: They must be of the Xibe ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 这肯定是锡伯族的朋友。

sentences.english: This is a Xibe family genealogy.
sentences.chinese: 这个是锡伯族家中的家谱。

sentences.english: I can also write in Xibe.
No wonder every Xibe man is good at archery.
sentences.chinese: 难怪锡伯族的人啊个个都善于拉弓射箭的。

sentences.english: Look, this is China's only Xibe language newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 你看，这可是中国唯一的锡伯文报纸啊。

sentences.english: It is in fact part of the Xibe folklore park.
sentences.chinese: 这里啊，是锡伯民俗风情园。

sentences.english: How come these Xibe people were relocated from northeast China to Xinjiang?
sentences.chinese: 锡伯族怎么会从东北迁到新疆呢？

sentences.english: Daniel, This is the famed Xibe calligrapher Mr. Ge Tuken.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，这位啊就是锡伯族著名的书法家格土肯先生。

definition: Daur ethnic group of Inner Mongolia and Heilongjiang
Xibo ethnic group of northeast China
Russian ethnic group (of northeast China and Xinjiang etc)/Russian nationality/Russians (of Russia)
Kyrgyz ethnic group/also written 柯爾克孜族|柯尔克孜族[Ke1 er3 ke4 zi1 zu2]
Altai republic in Russian central Asia, capital Gorno-Altaysk
Harqin (Mongol: guard)/Harqin banner or Kharchin khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia/also Harqin Left Mongol autonomous county in Chaoyang 朝陽|朝阳[Chao2 yang2], Liaoning
